headline.main: LINDBERGH ASSAILS TIE WITH RUSSIA; Tells San Francisco Audience He Would Prefer Alliance With Nazis Rather Than Soviets SEES NATIONS CONFUSED He Says America Cannot Be Sure Who Would Be Her Partner at War's End

lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, July 1 (AP) -- Charles A. Lindbergh told an anti-war mass meeting tonight "I would a hundred times rather see my country ally herself with England, or even with Germany with all her faults, than with the cruelty, the Godlessness, and the barbarism that exist in Soviet Russia."
abstract: S opposing U S aid to USSR, Amer First Com San Francisco rally
